description: The 30-year-old supermodel proved the thigh's the limit in a raunchy asymmetric mini-dress as she joined Bella Hadid at the jewellery showcase
title: Irina Shayk dons thigh-boots at Rue de La Boetie in Paris
title_page: Irina Shayk dons thigh-boots at Rue de La Boetie in ParisÂ  | Daily Mail Online
text:
She is one of the world's leading supermodels.
So Irina Shayk is rarely seen looking anything less than sensational - as proved when she attended the De Grisogono Photocall at Rue de La Boetie in Paris on Thursday.
The 30-year-old supermodel proved the thigh's the limit in a raunchy asymmetric mini-dress as she joined Bella Hadid at the jewellery showcase.
Scroll down for video
Racy look: Irina Shayk is rarely seen looking anything less than sensational - as proved when she attended the De Grisogono Photocall at Rue de La Boetie in Paris on Thursday
Irina showed off her incredible figure in the polo-neck mini-dress which appeared simple at first glance although featured a uniquely cut base which offered a flash of her toned legs.
Her thigh-high boots added a racy edge to the simple look - which although bland in colour and cut - was super sexy over all.
She clutched a small patent handbag with a silver studded trim - the perfect accompaniment to her sleek, colour-free ensemble.
Stunner: The 30-year-old supermodel proved the thigh's the limit in a raunchy asymmetric mini-dress as she joined Bella Hadid at the jewellery showcase
The only bold statement was her jewellery - no doubt pieces from De Grisogono - as she wore a glimmering ring with coordinating earrings.
The Sports Illustrated star slicked her brunette tresses into an elegant chignon which perfectly exhibited her flawless features.
Irina outlined her eyes in a smouldering bronze shadow while her stunning puckered pout outlined with a taupe lipstick.
Glimmering jewels: The only bold statement was her jewellery - no doubt pieces from De Grisogono - as she wore a glimmering ring with coordinating earrings
Bella went for a similar look as she rocked a simple black dress with a slashed stomach.
Giving a glimpse of her rippling abs she flaunted the flesh through the shredded panel in the middle.
Bella wore her hair in a similar style to Irina - yet again allowing the jewellery to speak for itself against the minimal colour-scheme of the look.
Chic: Bella wore her hair in a similar style to Irina - yet again allowing the jewellery to speak for itself against the minimal colour-scheme of the look
Irina and Bella have been hitting up the hottest shows at the Paris Fashion Week Haute Couture - walking and attending some of the hottest shows of the week.
The pair were last spied together at the Versace fashion show earlier in the week.
Other stars have descended on the French capital to attend the week including Rita Ora, Bella's sister Gigi and Cara Delevingne.
